SP: Wheeler, Nola, Thor, Suarez, Gibby 
BP: Ser, Robertson, Hand, Brogdon, Knebel, Alvarado, Bellatti, Nelson 

C: JT, Stubbs 
INF: Bohm, Stott, Didi, Sosa, Jean, Rhys

A good day for Dave Dombrowski and the Phillies.

Phillies landed, arguably, best rental starting pitcher and reliever that were traded at deadline. Took a bet on a controllable CF who is at least a plus defender. Held onto top prospects, outside Logan O'Hoppe, who was blocked in this org. Not a bad day.

The Phillies have been searching for starting pitching and have a deal in place to acquire Noah Syndergaard from the Angels.

https://t.co/HyB1ZzdNU5

So to recap: 

Familia became Robertson 
Herrera became Marsh 
Falter became Syndergaard 
Camargo became Sosa
Gregorius will become Segura 
Hall will become Harper 

All wins.

Odubel Herrera in CF: Minus-2 Defensive Runs Saved

I make this deal ten out of ten times -- especially when the price is Mickey Moniak and Jadiel Sanchez alone.

Sanchez is very talented but has a ways to go, and Moniak was taking up a 40-man spot, needed a change of scenery. Feels like a great deal for the Phillies here.
